tr.td: **Bad Pixel Masks** Masks for grot and bad pixels.More...
**Read Noise Files** Readout noise for each pixel as the 1 standard deviation noise level in electrons.More...
**Dark Files** Signal detected in the absence of photons from the sky.More...
**Temperature Dependent Darks** Temperature dependent signal detected in the absence of photons from the sky.More...
**Linearity Correction Files** Corrects for the non-linear response of the detectors and contains the saturation for each pixel.More...
**Flat Field Files** Static flatfield reference files.More...
**Temperature Dependent Flat Fields** Temperature dependent flatfields.More...
**Background Illumination Pattern Files** Dummy files, needed for CALNICB.More...
**Photometric Calibration Tables** Contain the photometry parameters for all observation modes.More...
**Geometric Distortion Coefficients Table** Used in correcting geometric distortion of image mode data.More...
**Persistence Model Files** Ring median of the BEP (Bright earth persistence) image.More...
**Persistence Mask Files** Combination of the bad pixel list with the 35x35 in the corners.More...
**Nonlincor Zeropoint Scaling Table** Ratio, for each filter, in zero point count rate before and after applying rnlincor.More...
**Nonlinearity Power Law Tables** The power law slope of count rate non-linearity at a number of wavelengths.More...
**Special Darks for SAACLEAN** Darks used by saaclean.More...
**SAA Darks** Special darks taken after SAA passage.More...
**ST-ECF Grism Calibration Files** Inverse sensitivity and wavelength calibration data for grisms.More...
